items.content_html: jSuites is a collection of lightweight common required javascript web components. It is composed of fully responsive vanilla plugins to help you bring the best user experience to your projects, independent of the platform. Same JS codebase across different platforms.
items.title: jsuites/jsuites: jSuites is a collection of lightweight common required javascript web components. It is composed of fully responsive vanilla plugins to help you bring the best user experience to your projects, independent of the platform. Same JS codebase across different platforms.

items.content_html: ⛔ A lightweight website blocker with a user friendly interface
items.title: AXeL-dev/distract-me-not: :no_entry: A lightweight website blocker with a user friendly interface

items.content_html: ProdTrack is a lightweight, easy-to-use product inventory management system built using PHP (Laravel). It allows users to efficiently manage their inventory by performing CRUD operations on products, tracking product quantities, and calculating the total value of stored items.
items.title: preston-56/product-inventory: ProdTrack is a lightweight, easy-to-use product inventory management system built using PHP (Laravel). It allows users to efficiently manage their inventory by performing CRUD operations on products, tracking product quantities, and calculating the total value of stored items.

items.content_html: A lightweight TypeScript library for extracting transaction IDs from Apple's ASN.1 encoded receipts.
items.title: tamtamchik/app-store-receipt-parser: A lightweight TypeScript library for extracting transaction IDs from Apple's ASN.1 encoded receipts.

items.content_html: ▪️ lightweight and user-friendly extension for splitting tabs
items.title: fr0st-iwnl/tabz: ▪️ lightweight and user-friendly extension for splitting tabs

items.content_html: The Queue Backend API is a lightweight Node.js and Express service that provides a RESTful endpoint for fetching queue items with timestamps. It supports CORS and includes a query parameter for API key simulation. Easy to set up, this API is designed for seamless integration with front-end applications.
items.title: mohamadsabori/Queue-Backend-API: The Queue Backend API is a lightweight Node.js and Express service that provides a RESTful endpoint for fetching queue items with timestamps. It supports CORS and includes a query parameter for API key simulation. Easy to set up, this API is designed for seamless integration with front-end applications.

items.content_html: A lightweight static web app that decrypts resources encrypted using AES-CBC, ensuring local, secure decryption with no server-side interaction.
items.title: fmichaud/uncrypt-aes-resource: A lightweight static web app that decrypts resources encrypted using AES-CBC, ensuring local, secure decryption with no server-side interaction.

items.content_html: A lightweight booking platform for tattoo artists.

items.content_html: Key Surfer is a lightweight keyboard event-handling library that helps you manage key press sequences and shortcuts in your web applications.
items.title: edggk/key-surfer: Key Surfer is a lightweight keyboard event-handling library that helps you manage key press sequences and shortcuts in your web applications.

items.content_html: Cookier is a lightweight, customizable cookie consent banner that informs users about cookie usage. It includes a simple "accept" button and a link for more information about cookies.
items.title: Decaded/Cookier: Cookier is a lightweight, customizable cookie consent banner that informs users about cookie usage. It includes a simple "accept" button and a link for more information about cookies.

items.content_html: A lightweight, responsive blog platform designed for seamless content sharing and an enjoyable reading experience. Featuring a sleek UI, dynamic post management, and easy customization, BlogBreeze is perfect for bloggers who want to create and manage their content effortlessly.
items.title: YashRajput09/BlogBreez: A lightweight, responsive blog platform designed for seamless content sharing and an enjoyable reading experience. Featuring a sleek UI, dynamic post management, and easy customization, BlogBreeze is perfect for bloggers who want to create and manage their content effortlessly.
